collection:
Privacy Policy:  
This Privacy Policy outlines the data collection, use, and sharing practices
of Statis Fund, LLC ("Statis Fund", "we", "us", or "our") in relation to our
website, marketing materials, and other platforms, including our use of the
GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) technology for financial analysis and
related services.
Data Collection and Use: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you use our services, register on our website, or communicate with us.
This may include personal information like your name, email address, and financial data necessary for the use of our services.
GPT Interaction Data: When you interact with our GPT for financial analysis, we may collect and store information about these interactions.
This includes queries you make, responses provided by the GPT, and any other related interaction data.
Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Our platforms may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platforms and hold certain information.
sharing:
Privacy Policy:  
This Privacy Policy outlines the data collection, use, and sharing practices
of Statis Fund, LLC ("Statis Fund", "we", "us", or "our") in relation to our
website, marketing materials, and other platforms, including our use of the
GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) technology for financial analysis and
related services.
Data Sharing and Disclosure: We do not sell, trade, or rent Users' personal identification information to others.

We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers for the purposes outlined above.
We may also disclose your information when legally required to do so, to protect our rights, or in urgent circumstances to protect personal safety.
